name: RapidShare.com - Cleaned 4 FreeUser
description:
18-09-2009 - All unwanted ads & junk removed for Free User only, 
             not suitable for Premium users.
30-09-2009 - Added button to change colour on hover.
09-10-2009 - Removed top drop-down menu.
07-08-2010 - Updated for site changes.
09-10-2010 - Total re-write for the new Rapidshare site style.
28-02-2011 - Updated
16-03-2011 - Rectified "line break in style causing critical error",
             thanks to @luckymouse
14-06-2011 - Re-written for new Rapidshare web page.
10-10-2011 - Re-written again for change in site style.
24-01-2012 - Total re-write, change in site style
08-03-2012 - Removed top-header & the annoying bouncing arrow.
